subject: Dear  friend
body:
Dear  friend
How are you today? I think it has been a long time since our last communication. In any case, I will contact you again in connection with our previous transaction, which was not successful for you. Sorry, your partnership with me cannot complete the funds transfer. I donâ€™t know, maybe because of the strong pressure you have to put up with your interest in the deal.
In any case, I am pleased to inform you of my success in receiving funds transferred by a new partner from Venezuela. I am currently in Venezuela for investment. However, I did not forget my previous efforts and tried to help me with the transfer of the fund, despite the fact that we could not come to a concrete conclusion. Thanks to my efforts to help me, my new partner and I decided to compensate you 850,000.00 euros so that you can enjoy joy and happiness with us.
I left your compensation visa with my secretary to help me send it. Now contact my secretary in Togo, her name is Mrs. Alifah Moumudun and her email address is (
alifahmoumudun278@gmail.com
). Tell her to send you a $ 850,000 Visa ATM card. I am currently very busy in Venezuela due to the investment projects I have with my new partner. Rather contact Alifah Moumudun, tell her where to send the compensation visa. The card will be sent to you immediately. I wish you the best in all your endeavors.
Yours sincerely
Wilson Jacob.

subject: Re: Dear  friend
body:
Hello Wilson Jacob,

I hope this message finds you well. It's been a while indeed since we last communicated, and I'm glad to hear from you again. 

It's wonderful to hear about your success in Venezuela with your new partner. I must say, it sounds like an exciting venture! Could you tell me more about the investment projects you're working on? 

As for the Visa ATM card, I appreciate your kind gesture. However, before proceeding further, could you please clarify a few things for me? What exactly is this card for and how does it work? Also, why is it necessary to contact Mrs. Alifah Moumudun in Togo?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rigoberto

subject: Hello my dear,
body:
*Hello my dear,Thank you for the message received. Yes, my Boss left a
debit card with me which is to be delivered to your home address via a
delivery company. The debit card is issued to your name by Citibank of
London. My Boss is now in Venezuela with his new partner and he instructed
me to send the debit card to your home address without delay.You are
required to send your home address information to me, so that I will
proceed to the delivery company quickly and make sure that your debit card
will be delivered to you as instructed by my Boss. So, you have to send to
me the following information as follows:1. Your Full name:
.....................2. Your Home Address: .....................3. Your
Country: .....................4. Your Phone No: .....................5.
Your Occupation: .....................Upon the receipt of the above
mentioned information, I will immediately proceed to the delivery company
to send your debit card to your home address without any delay. Send the
information to me quickly without any delay.I expect your urgent replyBest
RegardsMrs. Alifah Moumudun*

subject: Re: Hello my dear,
body:
Hello Alifah Moumudun,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this debit card from Citibank of London. I'm curious, how did my name get associated with this card? And why is it being sent from Venezuela? 

I'm also wondering about the delivery process. Which company will be handling the delivery? Is there a tracking number or something similar that I can use to follow the progress of the shipment?

Looking forward to hearing more details.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rigoberto
